name: Conway's game of Life (iloveyourwcw)
description:
This is my making of cellular automata, called the "game of life," an idea created by a brilliant man, John Conway.  May he rest in peace.

Also a good book to learn more about cellular automata is - 

https://www.wolframscience.com/nks/

Controls

1 - To erase screen

2 -  Does nothing, I kind of forgot to implement something when pressing 2, don't worry about it 

3 -  To half all cells on screen

4 - Randomizes alive cell count

5 - Changes Color 

C - Toggles between color and black and white

A - Hovering over cells toggles them to become alive

SPACE - Pause and unpause

R - restarts

ESC - quits

also... pressing v toggles on the on switch for a crazy pattern
